long_description: This Park crank puller is designed to remove crank arms from Shimano(R) Octalink spindles and ISIS Drive(R) splined systems. It uses a long, comfortable handle and a fine thread for the leverage needed to remove tight crankarms. Rotating tip ensures smooth operation and long life. Note: Will not work on crank arms that fit square, tapered bottom bracket spindles. Crankarms with a "one-key release" system do not use any crank puller tool--the one-key system acts as the remover.
short_description: This Park crank puller is designed to remove crank arms from Shimano(R) Octalink spindles and ISIS Drive(R) splined systems.
